translation:
To be seen with the great — Antônio Casas

Most Illustrious Sir,

Along I send to Your Excellency the Most Excellent Sir Dom Antônio Casas the amount of 945 pesos, which are paid, as evidenced by the receipt issued in said order; which I beg Your Excellency Tribunal of the Treasury to please command to be paid to me by the Collectory of this town, should it take place.

God keep Your Excellency  
Bagé, February 9, 1839.  
Joaquim Pereira Fagundes

To the citizen Serafim dos Anjos França. General Inspector of the National Public Treasury.
